metadata.name: True Ranching - Mint Pass 1
metadata.description:
"Every true rancher has true grit, and it's true grit that keeps the ranch running."

TR Mint Pass 1 Holders will receive TR airdrops starting with the True Rancher NFT on 28th February 2023. A True Rancher will become your avatar and character in the TR Gaming Experience. You can hold multiple passes and burn them all to earn multiple True Ranchers. 

Each True Rancher can join others to make a posse, and gather resources such as hired hands, horses and cattle. TR is more than an NFT collection, it is a way of life. It's also a game! 

From Spring 2023 the game rules and mechanics will be revealed and you'll have the option to combine your 'True Rancher' NFTs to earn a 'Posse' NFT. They can also be combined with other NFTs to earn an 'on horseback' NFT, a 'drover' NFT, or a 'Ranch Boss' NFT, among others.
